job_tasks.phrase: demonstrate how our Databricks Data Intelligence Platform can help customers solve their complex data challenges
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to understand customer business problems and map them to the platform's capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: align technical solutions with strategic goals
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly states the requirement to connect technical work with business objectives.
This highlights the dual focus on technical expertise and delivering tangible business outcomes.

job_tasks.phrase: Gain excitement from clients about Databricks through hands-on evaluation and Spark programming
job_tasks.justification: Spark programming is a key aspect of data engineering and data manipulation within the Databricks ecosystem.

job_tasks.phrase: integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the practical application of data integration, a core data engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Become a Big Data Analytics advisor on aspects of architecture and design
job_tasks.justification: Advising on architecture and design in Big Data Analytics implies understanding and guiding data infrastructure and flow.

job_tasks.phrase: authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications
job_tasks.justification: Creating reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications involves developing and documenting technical solutions, which falls under software development principles.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect with the goal of becoming an independently operating Solutions Architect.
job_tasks.justification: This implies building and demonstrating technical proficiency, leading to the development of solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: create a culture of proactiveness and a customer-centric mindset
work with a collaborative, customer-focused team
collaboration with an Account Executive and a Senior Solutions Architect
fosters a culture of creativity, experimentation, and continuous improvement.
help customers solve their complex data challenges
create customized solutions to help our customers achieve their goals

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes understanding business needs, client relationships, and advising on data analytics architecture and design. While Spark programming is mentioned, there is no explicit focus on generative AI models, LLMs, RAG, or fine-tuning, which are core to the GenAI Engineer profile.
